title: Rabbit Breeds Quiz
description: How well do you know rabbit breeds? From fluffy Angoras to floppy-eared Lops, find out here

questions.question: Which rabbit breed is known for its extremely long, fluffy wool that requires regular grooming and is often spun into yarn?
Which large rabbit breed can weigh over 20 pounds and is one of the biggest domestic rabbit breeds?
Which rabbit breed has distinctively long, floppy ears that hang down beside its face?
Which small rabbit breed, originating from the Netherlands, typically weighs only 2 to 2.5 pounds as an adult?
Which rabbit breed has a distinctive mane of longer fur around its head, resembling the mane of a big cat?
Which rabbit breed has a unique velvety, plush coat caused by a gene that makes the fur stand upright?
Which white rabbit breed with red eyes was historically used as a laboratory animal and is one of the most recognizable breeds?
Which rabbit breed has a white body with colored points (nose, ears, feet, and tail), similar to a Siamese cat's coloring?
Which rabbit breed is recognized by its distinctive coat pattern of alternating bands of two colors?
Which popular rabbit breed has a distinctive two-tone color pattern with a white blaze on its face and a white band around its body?
Which rabbit breed has a luxurious, extra-shiny coat due to a gene that makes each hair shaft translucent?
Which wild rabbit species is native to Europe and is the ancestor of all domestic rabbit breeds?
Which rabbit breed was developed in France and named for its resemblance to the fur of a South American rodent?
What is a baby rabbit called?
Which French rabbit breed is one of the oldest known breeds, has silver-tipped fur, and dates back to at least the 1600s?
